body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Baker's Delight support. My name is Stephen Jackson. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Stephen, I'm Olivia Stewart. I'm having some trouble with my bakery inventory.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hi Olivia, I'm sorry to hear that. Can you provide me with a bit more detail on the inventory issue you're experiencing?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Well, I noticed that some of my stock items are not updating correctly in the system, and it's leaving me quite confused.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand your concern. To better assist you, could you please provide me with your bakery's inventory ID number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Olivia. Could you also give me the name of the specific items that are not updating?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: It's primarily the sourdough bread and chocolate muffins.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it. I'm going to look into this issue for you. Please hold on for a moment.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thanks for waiting, Olivia. I've identified the problem and have corrected the inventory updates for your sourdough bread and chocolate muffins.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: That's great to hear, thank you so much, Stephen.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Olivia. Thank you for your patience. If you experience any further issues, feel free to contact us again. Have a wonderful day!
